{"id":311879568,"lang":"python","lang_name":"Python","time":"3 years, 5 months","timestamp":1584043477,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/311879568/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"11.9 MB","code":"class Solution(object):\n    def myPow(self, x, n):\n        \"\"\"\n        :type x: float\n        :type n: int\n        :rtype: float\n        \"\"\"\n        def fastpow(x, n):\n            if n == 0:\n                return 1 \n            half = fastpow(x, n // 2)\n            if n % 2:\n                return half * half * x\n            else:\n                return half * half\n        if n < 0:\n            x, n = 1 / x, -n\n        return fastpow(x, n)","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
